name: The Peace Summit
description:
The Present ≻ The Peace Summit was to be a keystone of the Clans & Guilds community on Roblox. The purpose of this group is to serve as a grounds for representatives in Clans to gather around, and contribute to making the Clans & Guilds community into something so much more. This group is laid to rest now.

The Bridge ≻ The Peace Summit was founded by ilijoi (Joi) and ScriptIntelligence (Scrizeebe). It was started in July of 2021, and its works were far into the future. It was majestic.

The Summit ≻ You can view The Summit here. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B6bAyB0sgjY 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Gkj-KzyLP4
